channel.title: RuneFocus
channel.description:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg690/scaled.php?server=690&filename=runefocusbanner.png&res=medium[/img]
Tried RuneSource(#377) and got in love with it.
[b]Videos:[/b]
Fletching: [youtube][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8[/url][/youtube] [b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li] [li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li] [li]Full Herblore[/li] [li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li] [li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li] [li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li] [li]All emotions[/li] [li]Teleporting[/li] [li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li] [li]Eating[/li] [li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills..[/li] [li]Animation/gfx support[/li] [li]Few shops[/li] [li]Npc spawns[/li] [li]Loads global objects[/li] [li]Started a skilling base[/li] [li]Messaging[/li] [li]Split Chat[/li] [li]Wielding Level requirments[/li] [li]Yell system[/li] [li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li] [li]Fletching with interfaces[/li] [li]Cooking with Interfaces, almost all fishes[/li] [li]WoodCutting[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Worked on some Fixes[/li] [li]Fixed Running(the button packet)[/li] [li]Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u can't use fm since I've havent even started the use item[/li][/ul] I will be releasing newer and newer version of RuneFocus, since I love to work on the RuneSource.
Pictures:
Emotions :) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg42/scaled.php?server=42&filename=emotes.png&res=medium[/img] Cooking
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg809/scaled.php?server=809&filename=cookingkarambwan.png&res=medium[/img] Anims
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg88/scaled.php?server=88&filename=cookingwithanims.png&res=medium[/img] Woodcutting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg200/scaled.php?server=200&filename=woodcuttingj.png&res=medium[/img] Runecrafting [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg687/scaled.php?server=687&filename=runecraftingy.png&res=medium[/img] Fletching with Interfaces [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg51/scaled.php?server=51&filename=fletchingwithinterfaces.png&res=medium[/img] Fletching anims, messages [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg692/scaled.php?server=692&filename=fletchinglvlup.png&res=medium[/img] Fishing [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=fishingo.png&res=medium[/img] Herb cleaning [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=cleaningherbs.png&res=medium[/img] Making potions [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg27/scaled.php?server=27&filename=potionmaking.png&res=medium[/img] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg89/scaled.php?server=89&filename=gemcutting.png&res=medium[/img] LVL Req [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg824/scaled.php?server=824&filename=craftingwithrequirments.png&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg839/scaled.php?server=839&filename=fletchingscratch.png&res=medium[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg717/scaled.php?server=717&filename=teleporting.png&res=medium[/img] Basic yell system
[ul][li]Player[/li] [li]Moderator[/li] [li]Administrator[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg695/scaled.php?server=695&filename=yellsystem.png&res=medium[/img] ~Combat~
[ul][li]Need to be worked on, it`s just a base[/li] [li]Anims[/li] [li]facing[/li] [li]interfaces[/li][/ul] [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg705/scaled.php?server=705&filename=whipemote.png&res=medium[/img]
Application:
Server Programmer [code] Name: Age: Sex: Country: Why do you want this job: Experience: Previous work: Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? How active would you be? Skype: [/code]
Website Designer: [code] Name: Age: Experience: Previous work: HTML/CSS/PHP.. : Why do you want this job: Skype:[/code]
Beta testers: [code] Name: Age: Any experience in this? How active would you be? Skype:[/code]
Hoster [code] Name: Age: Skype: Can you host 24/7: Do you have experience in hosting servers?: How much ram does your cpu have: Extra:[/code]

item.title: RuneFocus
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote="~synchronized, post:22, topic:413393"]Name: synchronized
Age: 18
Sex: is this even relevant?
Country: is this even relevant?
Why do you want this job: RuneSource is a powerful source which doesn’t seem to get the attention it deserves, with decent writtien content the server could go far and hopefully eliminate the infamous project insanitys servers out there
Experience: Worked with RuneSource before, developed ubersource (an early build of runesource) ref#: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499846.msg3655654.html#msg3655654
Previous work: Quite a bit of offline java programming, networking, not much work to show. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499846.msg3655654.html#msg3655654
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers?: What’s there to “abuse”…?
How active would you be?: Can contribute code daily.
Skype: Yes, but msn is preferred.

msn: synchronized.lol@hotmail.com[/quote]
I used your source. accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFocus
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“RedFalconBlue, post:18, topic:413393”]Name: Nick
Age: 14
Sex: Male
Country: United States
Why do you want this job: I’m a huge runesource fan but everytime I worked alone on it for a little while but, all of my work got deleted when my vps ran out and i forgot to backup my files on my computer. I really want to work with a team and really make a great server with Runesource.
Experience: I began coding about 5 years ago, but I wasn’t really serious about it until about 2-3 years ago. Mainly I started out with scripts but moved over to rsps about 3 years ago.
Previous work: I’ve never released any recent work but I’d really enjoy a chance to be a part of the team.
Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? Absolutely.
How active would you be? Atlease 2.5-5 Hours (Every day)
Skype: I do not use skype but I can get one if necessary. :)[/quote]
get skype, and what are you able to code on a RuneSource?

Read full topic

Experience: I began coding about 5 years ago, but I wasn’t really serious about it until about 2-3 years ago. Mainly I started out with scripts but moved over to rsps about 3 years ago.

Will you follow the rules and not abuse your powers? Absolutely.

item.title: RuneFocus
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“dawgs007, post:16, topic:413393”]Name: Tyler
Age: 16
Skype: dawgs007
Can you host 24/7: Yes, plug laptop in and put on cooling station.
Do you have experience in hosting servers?: Yes, 3 in the past and one currently (failing due to bad owner)
How much ram does your cpu have: 2GB
Extra: I know the RAM isn’t much but I don’t have any other devices running off of my router.[/quote]
Accepted.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneFocus
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

       [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg690/scaled.php?server=690&filename=runefocusbanner.png&res=medium[/img]

Tried RuneSource(#377) and got in love with it.

Videos:

Fletching:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dq9K9hDDyb8[/youtube]
Features

[ul][li]Fishing Base[/li]
[li]WoodCutting started from scratch[/li]
[li]Full Herblore[/li]
[li]Crafting (cutting Gems/leatherCrafting needs to be worked on.) - Level reqs, XP[/li]
[li]Prayer[/li]
[li]Fixed the shortbow glitch[/li]
[li]Fixed ground item stacking[/li]
[li]Fixed the equipment bug[/li]
[li]All emotions[/li]
[li]Teleporting[/li]
[li]Teleporting with level requirments[/li]
[li]Eating[/li]
[li]Potioning- You can drink potions and all, just need to make so it power/etc up your skills…[/li]
[li]Animation/gfx support[/li]
[li]Few shops[/li]
[li]Npc spawns[/li]
[li]Loads global objects[/li]
[li]Started a skilling base[/li]
[li]Messaging[/li]
[li]Split Chat[/li]
[li]Wielding Level requirments[/li]
[li]Yell system[/li]
[li]PlayerEditor - edits a char file[/li]
[li]Fletching with interfaces[/li]
[li]Cooking with Interfaces, almost all fishes[/li]
[li]WoodCutting[/li]
[li]RuneCrafting[/li]
[li]Worked on some Fixes[/li]
[li]Fixed Running(the button packet)[/li]
[li]Started Firemaking - Needs force walking and object creating (all logs work) - u can’t use fm since I’ve havent even started the use item[/li][/ul]
I will be releasing newer and newer version of RuneFocus, since I love to work on the RuneSource.

Pictures:

Emotions

Cooking


Anims


Woodcutting

Runecrafting

Fletching with Interfaces

Fletching anims, messages

Fishing

Herb cleaning

Making potions


LVL Req


Basic yell system

[ul][li]Player[/li]
[li]Moderator[/li]
[li]Administrator[/li][/ul]

~Combat~

[ul][li]Need to be worked on, it`s just a base[/li]
[li]Anims[/li]
[li]facing[/li]
[li]interfaces[/li][/ul]
